abstract: Justice Department reveals former Milwaukee police officer Christopher Manney will not face federal criminal civil rights charges due to lack of evidence; Manney fatally shot Dontre Hamilton in April 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department said there was insufficient evidence to pursue federal criminal civil rights charges against a former Milwaukee police officer in the death of an unarmed black man.

headline.main: Wisconsin: No Federal Charges for Ex-Officer in Man’s Death
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: No Federal Charges for Ex-Officer in Man’s Death

snippet: The Justice Department said there was insufficient evidence to pursue federal criminal civil rights charges against a former Milwaukee police officer in the death of an unarmed black man.
